Title: multiSearchAllPositionsUTF8
Description: Like multiSearchAllPositions but assumes haystack and the needle substrings are UTF-8 encoded strings.
haystack — UTF-8 encoded string in which the search is performed. String.needle — UTF-8 encoded substrings to be searched. Array.
Array of the starting position in bytes and counting from 1 (if the substring was found).0 if the substring was not found.
